message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to enhance your daily life and streamline your tasks. Considering its unique features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than $80. Would you be interested in purchasing it for this special introductory price?
I'm really interested in the product, but $95 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understand your budget constraints. After considering your offer, I am willing to negotiate further. How about we agree on a price of $80 for the product? This is a great opportunity to experience all its features at a very competitive price.
